song.title: A Vision
song.info:
(c)basehead/acid 1994 funky adlib sounds! :) this is my first attempt at adlib, so it's not that great... but i think i'm getting used to it. look for more adlib stuff from me in the near future.
-bh94- catchyalater!
-------- NOTE: This song was processed with ScreamTracker 3 (using DOSBox 0.72 Portable) and recorded with Audacity 1.2.6 (WinXP Pro)
